definition[0]: to move or make something move from side to side in a violent or uncontrolled way
example[0]: Salmon thrash their tails and leap from the water.
example[1]: The girl was thrashing about in the water.
definition[1]: to beat someone violently, especially in order to punish them
example[2]: My poor brother used to get thrashed for all kinds of minor offences.
definition[2]: to defeat someone very easily in a game
definition[3]: a violent movement from side to side
definition[4]: a type of loud fast rock music
